investors.title: How we protect investors
investors.description: Perform complex behavioral analysis and get answers in seconds with automated insights, enterprise security

items.title: Digital Trust Fund
items.description: In order to ensure the safety of the underlying assets a digital trust fund will be initiated. The regulated fund will maintain a token to shares ratio of 1:1.

items.title: SECURE SEGREGATED FUNDS
items.description: The securities account cannot be claimed by us or anybody else. All client funds are segregated. Thus client assets are protected and not affected even in the case of bankruptcy.

items.title: DUE DILIGENCE
items.description: Each investment opportunity will be carefully screened, compliance checked and rated by independent experts and ranked according to risks involved.

items.title: WEALTH PROTECTION
items.description: Brickblock enables  low to medium net-worth clients the same wealth protection as high net worth individuals, within a fully compliant framework.

items.title: REGULATORY COMPLIANT
items.description: In line with regulatory compliance all fund shares will remain liquid and be reclaimable by the token holder at any time.

items.title: LEGAL SUPPORT
items.description: Brickblock will work together with authorities to offer legal plug&play frameworks for investors as well as to fund managers.
